name: Dream Angkor
description:
Have you ever dreamt of dating a Hindu devata? In love with Angkor Wat? Then we've got the perfect game for you! Inspired by the theme of 'Angkor Wat' and the Hindu mythology 'Samudra Manthan', we made a game as a school project!

You are a beautiful Cambodian dancer, who has received a scholarship to your dream school, Angkor University! There you meet 3 extremely handsome brothers who turns out to be reincarnated devatas! Romance and drama awaits you here at Dream Angkor!

---

This is a school group project
disclaimer :
Similar names used inside the video and the game are purely coincidence
This game is intended for informational, entertainment, and educational purpose only. It is not it is not intended.

Software : Ren'Py
